item.description:
It's been a while since I have seen a comedy with the Boston Movie Group, and I just cannot resist Paul Rudd in one. He's one of my all-time faves. The trailer for Wanderlust is posted at the theater website. I laughed out loud when I watched it, so let's hope that's a good sign for the whole movie experience.

I will purchase my ticket at 4:30 p.m., then wait in the theater lobby between 4:30 and 4:45 p.m. Look for me and the red backpack. I will move into the theater auditorium at exactly 4:45. This weekend is opening weekend for Wanderlust, and the theater might be crowded. We want to find seats that are most comfortable for everyone.

No worries about sitting together: We will meet after the movie back in the theater lobby. If you are late, you can find me in the theater auditorium or in the theater lobby after the movie. Look for the red backpack.

The movie starts at 4:45 p.m.

If we decide to go out after the movie, be prepared to add 25% to the cost of your order for both the tax and the tip. Bring cash to make division of the check easier.

Please RSVP if you plan to attend this event so I know who to look for.

Marianne
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the red backpack. See the event description for more details.
item.name: Wanderlust (Comedy starring Paul Rudd)
